attributes.action: Remove the VAT for fuel during this difficult perioud
attributes.additional_details: We need help with this everyday price rising
attributes.background: The fuel price is very high and the government need to do something about it.same as you did before with covid-19 issue and lately with the electricity issue

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567
